entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
